    • longToString

      public String longToString()
      Return a message in "long" format Long format includes all the information we have on the message; and has the format MESSAGE ID: <UUID of message> STATUS: <status URL> DELIVERY: <delivery URL> CONTENTS: lt;hex encoded contents>
      Returns:
      The message in the long format.

    • readLongFormat

      public static Message readLongFormat(String s)
      Read a Message in long format.
      Parameters:
      s - The string to read from.
      Returns:
      The encoded message.

    • everythingToString

      public String everythingToString()
      Return a string with all the information we have about the message This method is very similar to longToString() except it includes information that longToString() leaves out. The format for the string is: 
       MESSAGE ID: <UUID of message> STATUS: <status URL> DELIVERY: <delivery URL> LAST STATUS: <status code from last delivery attempt> CONTENTS: <hex encoded contents>
      Returns:
      The message, in the format discussed above

    • readEverything

      public static Message readEverything(String s)
      Read a message in everything format The everything format is:
      MESSAGE ID: <UUID of message> STATUS: <status URL> DELIVERY: <delivery URL> LAST STATUS: <status code from last delivery attempt> CONTENTS: <hex encoded contents>
      Parameters:
      s - The string to read from
      Returns:
      The encoded format
